import React from 'react'; import './Skills.css'; // Import the CSS file import { Card, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; export const Skills = () => { return (

SKILLS

Familiar with: Java, JavaFX, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

 Familiar with Java, JavaFX, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript Software Applications MS Office, Google Docs, Visual Studio, MySQL, IntelliJ IDEA, Wix, Mailchimp, Figma Core Competencies Problem Solving and Troubleshooting, Creativity & Designing, Teamwork, Leadership Spoken Languages English, Bengali, Hindi, and Urdu
); };
